com.cs495.bucketbuddy

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs495.bucketbuddy.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerGame, TeamGame

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game is an abstract class providing functionality that is common to TeamGame and PlayerGame, including stat storing and retrieval.
